properties.description: Same as url, respecting html standard
properties.name: action

properties.description: Wether or not the default style should be applied         Values: true, false         Default: true
properties.name: defaultStyle

properties.description: Set where to send form data
properties.name: url

methods.description: Return an string of form data for ajax request
methods.name: _generateParams

methods.description: Returns whether the provided node is a checkbox or not
methods.name: _isCheckBox

methods.description: Returns whether the provided node is a radio or not
methods.name: _isRadioButton

methods.description: Returns whether the provided node is a radio group or not
methods.name: _isRadioGroup

methods.description: Returns whether the provided node is a toggle or not
methods.name: _isToggle

methods.description: Check if the default element style should be applied
methods.name: _setDefaultStyle

methods.description: XMLHttpRequest to the schema provided by the user
methods.name: _setupSchema

methods.description: Reads the schema and and the data object and compares/validates them
methods.name: _validate

methods.description: Return form values as an object
methods.name: getData

methods.description: Restores the form elements to the previous saved data
methods.name: restore

methods.description: Saves the current data of the form elements
methods.name: saveData

methods.description: Sets the provided data to the form elements
methods.name: setData
